item.title: Apple Secures Half of TSMC's 2nm Production Capacity for iPhone 18
item.description: Apple has ordered almost half of TSMC’s initial 2nm production capacity for the iPhone 18 as the pure foundry begins mass production of its next-generation chip process. According to DigiTimes, TSMC’s
